## Preview

-   If a survey is complicated (e.g. complicated display logic and branching), preview may be time-consuming.

-   You can preview only a question or a block. ![qualtrics-preview-ignore validation](pictures/qualtrics-preview%20question.png) ![qualtrics-preview-ignore validation](pictures/qualtrics-preview%20block.png)

-   If you wanna freely browse while in preview mode without completing forced responses, etc., Tools -\> Ignore Validation

![qualtrics-preview-ignore validation](pictures/qualtrics-preview-ignore%20validation.png){width="400"}
